        Parameters:
        entity - entity to resolvecolliion
        model - world info
        depthLimitFromBottom - extra offset for edge collision from bottom

      • resolveEdgeCollisions

        public static void resolveEdgeCollisions(AnimalEntity entity,
                         WorldModel model,
                         double depthLimitFromBottom,
                         double depthLimitFromSurface)
        Check if near edge, adjust direction if outside acceptable zones
        Parameters:
        entity - entity to be checked for edge breaking
        model - model world
        depthLimitFromBottom - extra distance species should not cross at bottom
        depthLimitFromSurface - extra distance species should not cross at top, no flying fish
